\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w*, \w in|strong="H1980"\w* simplicity \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w uprightness|strong="H3476"\w*: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* wilt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* wilt \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w ordinances|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*,
